title: Failure Trace Log (FTL) Schema
description: Defines the detailed immutable structure generated upon GSEP P-01 FAIL, referenced by the ASM for diagnostic analysis.

ftl_id.description: The unique, immutable ID for this FTL entry, corresponding to ASM.ftl_reference.

asm_tx_id.description: The tx_id of the associated Audit Summary Manifest (ASM).

failure_context.description: High-level summary of the execution context leading to failure.

source_module.description: Component or Module responsible for execution.

trigger_event.description: The proximate action or input causing the fault.

diagnostic_trace.description: Detailed sequence of events and internal state required for fault analysis.
